fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Royalty: Your role is revealed at the beginning of the game as simply "King". Any attempt to check your role, even your true role, will show up as "King" as well. You will appear to win with Order.
- Wealthy: You start with 6 HP and 6 cards. Your hand limit is 6. 
- Paranoia: You only have 2 channels. You cannot participate in Duels. 
- Outsider: You will learn all Outsider roles that are present at the start of the game. You are able to win with all Outsider roles. Outsider roles that require the King to die, such as Conqueror, will not appear. **You will have extra uses of some abilities the Order King normally has.*

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Guards: Block! an attack. [4 uses, 2 CD]
- Doctors: Heal! 1 HP. Cleanse! an effect off of you. [4 uses, 2 CD] 
- Restrain: Prevent a player from using cards in the next phase. [2 uses, 4 CD, Unique] 
- Retreat: Go to the Kingâ€™s Quarters this Night phase. [1 use, Unique] 
- Sense Intent: Learn if a chosen player truly wins with you or not. If they do, you may choose to create a whisper channel with them without using up a channel. [1 use]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only Outsiders have won at the end of the game.
